snippet.title: Williams Arcade's Greatest Hits - Super Nintendo - Gameplay
snippet.description:
Super Nintendo - Digital Eclipse / Williams - 1996

A Shortplay of all featured classic games in the multicart :)

Williams Arcade's Greatest Hits is a video game anthology for the Super NES, PlayStation, Sega Genesis, Sega Saturn, Game.com, and Dreamcast game consoles. It was also released for DOS and Windows.

The DOS, Windows, and game.com versions go under the name Williams Arcade Classics.

Content

This video game anthology features 1980s arcade games from the Williams Electronics company. The games included are:

Defender
Defender II
Joust
Robotron: 2084
Sinistar
Bubbles (only on Saturn, PlayStation, DOS, Windows, Dreamcast)

Also included on some ports are bonus materials, video clips, and concept arts, along with access to the original debug menus.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Williams_Arcade%27s_Greatest_Hits

Williams’ Arcade Classics is one of the first classic game compilations ever made. Williams did a good job with their innovative idea. There are some kinks to work out for their next classic game compilation, but Williams basically started this trend that has swept the gaming industry of late. Kudos to Williams, for beginning such a popular concept. 

https://www.gamefaqs.com/snes/588199-williams-arcades-greatest-hits/reviews/13273
